nodes.documentation:
@notice This contract describes the status of a box of eggs. 
It tracks a series of data sensed during its shipment of the box.
The box has a state that can be modified by different callers.
If the sensed data are bad, then a PenaltyFunction contracts computes a penalty value and it will be applied to the box.
A reference to a PenaltyFunction contract is given as constructor argument.
nodes.name: BoxIncomplete

methods.constructor: Constructor. Stores the addresses of the actors and the penalty function

push_data(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Push sensed data samples to the contract. Only the transporter can push such data

ship().notice: Change the state from READY to SHIPPING. Callable by the transporter

userdoc.notice: This contract describes the status of a box of eggs.  It tracks a series of data sensed during its shipment of the box. The box has a state that can be modified by different callers. If the sensed data are bad, then a PenaltyFunction contracts computes a penalty value and it will be applied to the box. A reference to a PenaltyFunction contract is given as constructor argument.
